chapter.title: 03.01.2016-SUPER TUESDAY
chapter.paragraph: One of the most important days of the American primaries. People will vote in 13 countries and it could be a decisive moment. “The problem is that candidates have any ideas what to do about fixing housing market.”

*WHY BOTHER ABOUT MR.TRUMP? D.Trump, known as "The Brick magnate", is the richest man in America and one of the most controversal personality in the world of politics. He colonized Manhattan and beyond, owning apartments, hotels and casinos. Thanks to this position he could have a big impact on the realty sector if americans will make him their new president.
